backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping premium UI, unlock flow, and gated steps to involved frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme setup defining color variables and light/dark UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the main app and PWA metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web manifest enabling PWA install with icons and app metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the CalculatorPage inside a full‑height layout.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Calcula: Displays the current expression, result, or errors with styled layout.
Renders the scientific keypad and emits button events to the calculator logic.
Main calculator screen integrating display, keypad, history, steps, and premium section with view switching.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Premium: UI block providing UPI payment buttons, confirmation flow, and premium status display.
frontend/src/features/calculator/useCalc: Hook handling expression editing, parsing, evaluation, error handling, and step generation.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryPan: History view showing past calculations with scrolling and a clear‑history control.
frontend/src/features/history/useLocalHi: Manages calculator history in localStorage with functions to add and clear entries.
frontend/src/features/premium/usePremium: Tracks and persists premium status in localStorage with methods to unlock or reset it.
frontend/src/features/steps/StepsPanel.t: Displays step-by-step solution UI, limiting visible steps for non-premium users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty query set since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/calc/evaluate.ts: Evaluates an AST to a numeric result, supporting operators, functions, constants, and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/calc/math.ts: Implements factorial with validation and size limits.
frontend/src/lib/calc/parse.ts: Parses tokens into an AST supporting operator precedence, functions, constants, and errors.
frontend/src/lib/calc/stepSolver.ts: Generates human-readable evaluation steps from an expression, including tokens, AST, and evaluation order.
frontend/src/lib/calc/tokenize.ts: Converts an expression string into tokens, handling numbers, functions, operators, constants, and normalization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme settings, and several plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, goals, architecture notes, issues, and implemented feature metadata for the IC calculator app.
